member.name: IMFMediaStreamSourceSampleRequest.SetSample
member.summary: Sets the sample for the media stream source.
member.param: The sample for the media stream source.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaStreamSourceSampleRequest
member.summary: Represents a request for a sample from a MediaStreamSource.
